entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is known for his large size and friendly demeanor. He is described as 'stoutly' defending himself against Umbridge's accusations.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is a Ministry-appointed teacher at Hogwarts who is known for her strict and condescending attitude. She is described as 'sleekly' accusing Hagrid of having visitors.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is a large dog that belongs to Hagrid and is known for its loyalty. It is described as 'sniffing loudly' around Umbridge's robes.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts who is known for her intelligence and quick thinking. She gasps in surprise when she sees the footprints leading to Hagrid's cabin.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who is known for his bravery and leadership skills. He claps a hand over Hermione's mouth to prevent her from speaking out of turn.

relationships.description: Hagrid is the owner of Fang, as evidenced by his statement 'I sometimes say Fa ng’s near enough human —'.
Umbridge accuses Hagrid of having visitors, as evidenced by her statement 'There are three sets of footprints in the snow leading from the castle doors to your cabin'.
Hermione witnesses the footprints leading to Hagrid's cabin and gasps in surprise, as evidenced by her reaction.
